basics.name: clusterName
basics.label: Cluster name
basics.toolTip: The name of the new Azure Container service.

constraints.validationMessage: Cluster names must be between 3 and 24 characters long, and can contain only numbers and lowercase letters.

basics.name: adminUsername
basics.label: Username
basics.toolTip: Admin username for the virtual machines.

basics.name: adminPassword
basics.toolTip: Admin password for the virtual machines.

constraints.validationMessage: The password must be between 6 and 72 characters long, and contain characters from at least 3 of the following groups: uppercase characters, lowercase characters, numbers, and special characters.
